JUNE 2023 GRANT PROGRAM

 

The Tied Tokens Project is interested in forming a growing community and increasing the number of users of synthetic tokens being developed.

Therefore, we are announcing a grant program aimed at motivating grantees to develop marketing mechanisms for promoting Tied Tokens Project products, as well as attracting new community members.

  • The grant is provided in TTP project tokens and synthetic USDT tokens (USDT) in the proportion of 10% x 90%.
  • 5,000,000 TTP and 45,000,000 USDT (USDT) are reserved for grants.
  • The amount of the grant per grantee is limited to a maximum amount of 1,000,000 TTP + 9,000,000 USDT (USDT).
  • At least 80% of the grant received should be used for transfer to new community members attracted by the grantee.

Grant applications are accepted and considered during June 2023 by e-mail tiedtokenproject@proton.me with the indication in the subject of the letter "GRANT202306"

The application must contain the following mandatory sections:

  • Name of the applicant
  • Email for communication
  • Wallet address in the BSC network
  • Requested grant amount
  • A brief description of what the grant is being requested for
  • Expected increase in the number of users
  • Additional information at the request of the applicant
